page.title: 03Farming
page.content:
A typical forester's day: { {7.45}travel to site. {7.55}carry tools into wood. {8.00}checking fuel, tool maintenance. {8.05}start felling windblown spruce. {9.30}break for snack and drink. {9.45-12.30}felling and extraction with tractor. {12.30-1.15}lunch. {1.15}tool maintenance. {1.20-3.00}felling,extraction and conversion. {3.00}break. {3.10-4.00}felling, extraction and conversion. {4.00}pack up tools and return home.
n.b. conversion means preparing the wood for the lorries to take away. {see page 2 for a forester's year
